Package io.vertigo.account.plugins.account.store.text

Class TextAccountStorePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertigo.account.plugins.account.store.text.TextAccountStorePlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccountStorePlugin, Activeable, CoreComponent, Plugin
    public class TextAccountStorePlugin
extends Object
implements AccountStorePlugin, Activeable
    A simple implementation of the Realm interface that uses a set of configured account accounts and roles to support authentication and authorization. Each account entry specifies the accountname, password, and roles for a account. Roles can also be mapped to permissions and associated with accounts.

    Account accounts and roles are stored in two Maps in memory, so it is expected that the total number of either is not sufficiently large.

    Since:
    0.1
